>
[Divine Health](/Feats.aspx?ID=224) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 111 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[tenets of good](/Tenets.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

Your faith makes you resistant to disease, protecting you as you offer succor to the ill. You gain a +1 status bonus to saves against diseases. In addition, if you roll a success on a save against a disease, you get a critical success instead.
